fields.name: date_time [UTC]
fields.title: Date time
fields.description: Date and time of the end of each five-minute time interval in the ISO 8601 format YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss+00:00 [UTC]

fields.name: latitude [degN]
fields.title: Latitude
fields.description: Average latitude of the ship on which the measurements took place, during the five-minute time interval [decimal degrees North]
fields.x_spi_cf_attribute: Average latitude of the ship on which the measurements took place, during the five-minute time interval

fields.name: longitude [degE]
fields.title: Longitude
fields.description: Average longitude of the ship on which the measurements took place, during the five-minute time interval [decimal degrees East]
fields.x_spi_cf_attribute: Average longitude of the ship on which the measurements took place, during the five-minute time interval

fields.name: 03 [ppb]
fields.title: Ozone concentration
fields.description: Concentration of ozone (O3) measured in parts per billion during the five-minute interval [ppb]

fields.name: CH4 [ppm]
fields.title: Methane concentration
fields.description: Concentration of methane (CH4) measured in parts per million during the five-minute interval [ppm]

fields.name: CO [ppb]
fields.title: Carbon monoxide concentration
fields.description: Concentration of carbon monoxide (CO) measured in parts per billion during the five-minute interval [ppb]

fields.name: CO2 [ppm]
fields.title: Carbon dioxide concentration
fields.description: Concentration of carbon dioxide (CO2) measured in parts per million during the five-minute interval [ppm]
